name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a seasoned Senior Java Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in full-stack development using **Java**, **Microservices**, and **Spring Boot** technologies. My proficiency includes designing and implementing scalable applications with frameworks such as **Spring Data JPA**, **Spring Security**, and client-side frameworks like **Angular**. I have a solid understanding of **API Gateway** strategies and robust architectural patterns, including **SOLID principles** and **Design Patterns**. 
Furthermore, I am experienced in utilizing containerization technologies like **Docker** and orchestration with **Kubernetes** to ensure seamless CI/CD pipelines. My extensive knowledge of databases such as **PostgreSQL**, **SQL Server**, coupled with caching strategies using **Redis**, allows me to enhance application performance significantly.
Having led teams through Agile methodologies, I am skilled in project management using tools like **JIRA** and adept at writing unit tests with **JUnit** and **Test Containers**. Additionally, I bring expertise in event-driven systems, employing patterns like **SAGAS** and **Circuit Breaker** to create resilient applications. I am committed to delivering high-quality software that adheres to industry standards and best practices.
